cards.name: Hand of Genesis
cards.originalText:
Flying
Whenever Hand of Genesis deals combat damage to a player, manifest the bottom card of your library. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
